title: How to get the kids involved with family chores from Say Yes
description:
Say Yes blogger Liz shares some great tips to get the kids involved with family chores.
As cold and flu season approaches get proactive about the cleanliness of toys, car seats, door handles, and other common hard surfaces without getting out the paper towels. These common surfaces can hold cold and flu germs for up to 48 hours

asset.author: Lysol
